name: Hospital Only Prescribing
title: Hospital Only Prescribing
description: Primary care prescribing of Hospital Only medicines as designated by the NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: The NHS Dictionary of Medicines and Devices designates certain
medicines as hospital only as the manufacturer has specified it should generally be used in hospitals. This measure suports review and audit
of appropriateness as sometimes they may be selected in error for example zuclopenthixol acetate (blog here) .
Please note that this is an experimental measure. We would be grateful for
numerator_where:
bnf_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT(bnf_code) FROM {measures}.dmd_objs_hospital_only)
AND bnf_code NOT IN (
'0406000S0%CAC', -- Ondansetron HCl_Tab 8mg
'0408010F0%BAB', -- Clonazepam_Tab 500mcg
'0408010F0%CAC', -- Clonazepam_Tab 2mg
'0703021Q0%AAAA', -- Desogestrel_Tab 75mcg
'0704050R0AAABAB' -- Tadalafil_Tab 20mg
